reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous and comfortable, with great fit and stretchiness. The material quality receives mixed feedback - while some love it, others find it cheap. Customers disagree on whether the dress is see-through, with some noting it's not see-through as shown in pictures. The sizing is also mixed, with some finding it perfect while others say it runs bigger. items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not waste your time or money!!
items.body: If I could give this zero stars I would! Iâ€™m sooo pissed! I had a company Christmas party I needed to attend and the dress took forever to arrive and when it did it was awful! It feels like a Halloween costume. Nothing like itâ€™s pictured here. I tried it on and requested a refund within minutes. Will never do business with this company again Read more
items.author: ShaRhonda

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Almost flawless
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Pros: absolutely stunning, Looks expensive, Goes perfectly with my outfit, stretchy, and the under body suit fits (sometimes body suits are too short but this one is perfect) Cons: the built in bra is not made to support which works fine for girls with perky boobs. My issue is the bra is just sooo big for a size small dress. The straps arenâ€™t adjustable either and you have to be very careful not to snag anything on the dress because itâ€™s sort of like pantyhose and gets caught on jewelry then tears. But thatâ€™s just me being picky, the dress is so worth the money because itâ€™s just beautiful. Iâ€™m 5â€™5, 124lbs, mom of 2, 25â€ waste, 36b bra Read more
items.author: miwa

items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Zipper kept breaking, wanted to love it so bad
items.body: I had to buy this dress twice because it kept breaking. I saw this dress and fell in love, some reviews warned about the zipper, but most said it was perfect and had no issues. I bought a medium as thatâ€™s my usual size. It was gorgeous and fit well but could have been a little more snug. Of course while I was trying to take it off after trying it on, the zipper broke. I still had some time before my bachelorette party, so I decided Iâ€™d just get another one and size down while Iâ€™m at it. It fit great and I wore it just fine for the first half of the bachelorette party. but once we got to the club, my zipper broke again. My entire back was exposed and I was in the bathroom for 45 minutes trying to fix it. Ended up just having to use some safety pins we got from staff. If youâ€™re willing to risk the zipper entirely breaking on you for your event then I recommend it because it is so flattering and stretchy. Read more
items.author: Jasmin Martz

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Golden 8, Khaki, 840-black, 840-golden, Black 10, 2020 Black, 548-apricot, Black, 548-black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
